kDesc

Black Policeman's shirt as worn by the T-1000. Part of the T-1000 character clothing set. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

Chemise de policier noire identique à celle portée par le T-1000. Disponible dans le lot de vêtements du T-1000. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

Schwarzes Polizeihemd, wie es der T-1000 trägt. Teil des Kleidungssets für den Charakter T-1000. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

Camicia nera da poliziotto indossata dal T-1000. Parte del set d'abbigliamento del personaggio T-1000. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

Camisa negra de policía, como la del T-1000. Forma parte del atuendo del personaje de T-1000. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. T-1000が着ていたブラックの警察官のシャツ。T-1000のキャラクターファッションセットの一つです。 \n\nTerminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

T-1000이 입었던 것과 같은 검은색 경찰 셔츠입니다. T-1000 캐릭터 복장 세트의 일부입니다. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]
